member.name: MediaFile.Id
member.summary: Gets the primary key of this in the database.

member.name: MediaFile.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file, without the path.

member.name: MediaFile.Folder
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the folder which contains the file.

member.name: MediaFile.SizeInBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the file in bytes.

member.name: MediaFile.CreatedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time the file was created.

member.name: MediaFile.ModifiedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time the file was modified.
